attributes.action: Return the remains of the statue of Anahit to Armenia
attributes.additional_details: We ask the Department of Culture, Media and Sport to advise the British Museum to return the remaining fragments of the statue of Anahit, the Armenian Goddess of fertility (taken from Turkish-occupied Armenia in 1878) to the care of the Armenian Museum of History, Yerevan

rejection.details: This is a matter for the British Museum.
